item.title: Berg Inn
item.description: A creaky old bar on the cusp of breaking apart. Settled on the edge of the wall, people still wonder why it stands.

item.title: Bergthold
item.description: Hes the owner and bartender of the Berg Inn.

item.title: Cornered Inn
item.description: The cornered inn, sits at the edge of two meeting canals.

item.title: Dreg
item.description: The Dreg is a spore-like substance that swallows light, warmth, and motion itself — drawn to anything that lives, stirs, or burns.

item.title: Droskow
item.description: Droskow began as a humble fishing hamlet on the marsh, blessed with waters so rich that nets could be lowered from windows and hauled up heavy with silver-scaled bounty.

item.title: Prolog
item.description: You wake up in a narrow alley, heavy with the smell of salt, smoke, and rust. Your head buzzes — maybe too much drink last night.

item.title: Syphons
item.description: Syphons are devices that are funnels with light sources in them, as soon as the light is swallowed by the dreg, it closes its lid and captures it inside of it.
